notes: Lists diagnostic log strings (e.g., ERROR FAN LOST) with recommended fixes.

notes: Kernel log strings for S9 series (fan error etc.) and resolution steps.

title: KA3 log diagnosis and processing
notes: Provides typical KA3 errors: sweep error string F:1, drop board, high temp poweroff message, PSU related notes.

notes: Covers kernel log patterns: EEPROM Error, Missing chips/boards, Read Temp Sensor Failed, Overtemp Protection etc.

notes: Mentions kernel log 'Fatal Error: some Fan lost or Fan speed low' and fan voltage swapping check.
